I'm am stardust. I was born with dyslexia, dyspraxia, ASD.
I woke one morning, to early to get out of bed so I channel flicked.
Realizing there was nothing good on I stopped and landed on the news channel incidentally.
The report announced "On later news a new president has risen to power and here is hie first words."
"I declare that people with mental disorders are the greater people, but not as great as me, so there should be in charge and never disobeyed," He announced. "I would like all of these special people to come to me tomorrow at 3pm. No one is to be late." The report finished.
All I could do is grin. All my life I was inferior, all ways been pushed about now it's my time to shine. I am now superior.
What should I do?
I should be nice but I want payback for how I've been treated for my whole life because I was born with my disabilities.

info.description:
Only people with mental disorders (like dyslexia, dyspraxia, ASD, ADHD, Autism, asperger, etc.) may start a new storyline. people without may add to a storyline that has already been made. If you want to make a second story, request permission.
To start with it's a weekend morning when someone with one of the above comes to power, so people like this gain control.
use the handle of the person who started that character (If you started use your own handle)
You family is all normal. Make up your own family.
you are in charge and you cannot be denied, friends may be included who also have this problems.
do what you like.
